designNotes.zones: Designated farming areas with minerals and herbivores - reliable resource gathering
designNotes.biomes: Small bonus clumps (2-4) of resources, unique resources only spawn here requiring combat to reach
designNotes.lore: Humans and dinosaurs co-exist through WWI era. Continent divided by war and totalitarian regimes. No magic, no fantasy naming.
designNotes.weaponReference: All firearms based on WWI/WWII infantry weapons. Melee is combination of medieval and trench warfare tools.

equipment.name: M1903 Springfield
equipment.recipe: 3x Steel Ingot + 1x Rifle Stock + 1x Precision Mechanism

equipment.name: Winchester M1897
equipment.recipe: 3x Steel Ingot + 1x Rifle Stock + 1x Precision Mechanism
